Nov 9, 2002

Report Criticizes Colombia on Militias

“A new report by Human Rights Watch asserts that Colombia’s attorney general has undermined investigations of right-wing paramilitary groups by firing or transferring prosecutors, particularly those working on cases in which military officers were believed to have assisted the groups in mass killings or assassinations.” NY Times
